channel.title: Hard Ops on Petfactory

item.title: Blender - Hard Ops
item.description: Hard Ops official docs Tips Shortcuts Hops Menu : Q Bevel Helper : Ctrl Shift B ST3 Mesh Tools Selection to Boolean : Create a boolean from the selected face. Select the face(s) Q > ST3 Mesh Tools > Selection to Boolean LMB click once, you can now move the mouse to adjust the extrude depth. Press X to switch to setting the offset. Press X again to set the offset Pressing X again will cycle back to setting the extrude depth.
